name: typescriptenigma
description: Hi y'all! So I thought I'd have some fun and made myself a TypeScript Enigma Machine!

scripts.encode: echo npm doesn't behave well with flagged arguments. Use 'npx ts-node Main.ts [--args]' for a local ts-node install or 'ts-node Main.ts [--args]' if installed globally
scripts.dencode: echo npm doesn't behave well with flagged arguments. Use 'npx ts-node Main.ts -decode [--args]' for a local ts-node install or 'ts-node Main.ts -decode [--args]' if installed globally

author: Miguel Salazar
